channel.title: Crusade - 742 RuneScape Private Server
channel.description:
Hello fellow Crusadians, and new players! I am planning on doing a drop party once we hit 13 players online at any given point. So please, ask your friends to get on crusade and play! ~~~Here is what will be dropped as of now~~~ Dragon claws x1 vesta set x2 armadyl battlestaff x1 Vesta longswordx1 Polypore staff x2 Glaivens, steads or ragefire boots x1 Beserker ring x1 Archer ring x1 Seer's ring x1 25M GP x2 Bandos chestplate x1 BGS x1
Hope to see you all there! #spectralsIsGod
http://crusade-rsps.com/

item.title: Crusade - 742 RuneScape Private Server
item.dc:creator: @famuzx famuzx
item.description:
@famuzx wrote:

You call this an advertisement? i don’t even know what kind of server i’m gona join or what is so special about your server what makes me want to join. so please add some info about the server and add some pictures.

Read full topic

item.title: Crusade - 742 RuneScape Private Server
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

I like that homepage and forum theme you’re using - very nice. Other than that, I would strongly recommend that you reformat this thread as it’s slacking extremely bad. You could use some media and a more organized thread, that would help you - I’m sure. Good luck.

Read full topic
